https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/95k1w51OyKRnEUQTEby7tOu9Epx.jpg The urban legend about the blog which brings tragedy and fear. Shy and inner minded high schoolgirl Hitomi starts her blog with fake name. She writes and jokes about her school and friends, but whoever name is written on the blog encounters terrifying tragedy, even death. Death Blog
